blocks.name: df-coss
blocks.content: Define the class of cosets by ` R ` : ` x ` and ` y ` are cosets by ` R ` iff there exists a set ` u ` such that both ` u R x ` and ` u R y ` hold, i.e., both ` x ` and ` y ` are are elements of the ` R ` -coset of ` u ` (see ~ dfcoss2 and the comment of ~ dfec2 ). ` R ` is usually a relation. This concept simplifies theorems relating partition and equivalence: the left side of these theorems relate to ` R ` , the right side relate to ` ,~ R ` (see e.g. ~~? pet ). Without the definition of ` ,~ R ` we should have to relate the right side of these theorems to a composition of a converse (cf. ~ dfcoss3 ) or to the range of a range Cartesian product of classes (cf. ~ dfcoss4 ), which would make the theorems complicated and confusing. Alternate definition is ~ dfcoss2 . Technically, we can define it via composition ( ~ dfcoss3 ) or as the range of a range Cartesian product ( ~ dfcoss4 ), but neither of these definitions reveal directly how the cosets by ` R ` relate to each other. We define functions ( ~ df-funsALTV , ~ df-funALTV ) and disjoints ( ~ dfdisjs , ~ dfdisjs2 , ~ df-disjALTV , ~ dfdisjALTV2 ) with the help of it as well. (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 9-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-coss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccoss(c0), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
}

blocks.name: df-coels
blocks.content: Define the class of coelements on the class ` A ` , see also the alternate definition ~ dfcoels . Possible definitions are the special cases of ~ dfcoss3 and ~ dfcoss4 . (Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 20-Nov-2019.)

(Contributed by Peter Mazsa, 16-Jan-2018.)

thm dfcoss2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wceq(ccoss(c0), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cec(cv(s2), c0))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  eqtr4i(ccoss(c0), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cec(cv(s2), c0))))), copab(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  df-coss(s0, s1, s2, c0)
  opabbii(s0, s1, wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cec(cv(s2), c0)))), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))
  exbii(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cec(cv(s2), c0))), wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))
  anbi12i(wcel(cv(s0), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wcel(cv(s1), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))
  el2v(s2, s0, wb(wcel(cv(s0), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0))))
  elecALTV(cv(s2), universe, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  el2v(s2, s1, wb(wcel(cv(s1), cec(cv(s2), c0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))
  elecALTV(cv(s2), universe, cv(s1), universe, c0)
}

  -| diffss(s0, s1)

  df-coss(s0, s1, s2, cres(c0, c1))
  opabbii(s0, s1, wrex(s2, c1, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wrex(s2, c1, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wa(wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))))
  df-rex(s2, c1, wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1))))
  exbii(s2, wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s1))))
  bitr4i(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wa(wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))), wa(wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), cres(c0, c1), cv(s1))), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wcel(cv(s2), c1), wbr(cv(s2), c0, cv(s1)))))

} = {
  eqtr4i(, ~((c0 |` c1)), { < s0, s1 > | ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c0]s0 ‚àß s2[c0]s1))}, { < s0, s1 > | ‚àÉ(s2,(s2[(c0 |` c1)]s0 ‚àß s2[(c0 |` c1)]s1))})
  df-coss(s0, s1, s2, (c0 |` c1))
  opabbii(s0, s1, ‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c0]s0 ‚àß s2[c0]s1)), ‚àÉ(s2,(s2[(c0 |` c1)]s0 ‚àß s2[(c0 |` c1)]s1)))
  bitri(‚àÉ(s2 ‚àà c1,(s2[c0]s0 ‚àß s2[c0]s1)), ‚àÉ(s2,(s2[(c0 |` c1)]s0 ‚àß s2[(c0 |` c1)]s1)), ‚àÉ(s2,(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(s2[c0]s0 ‚àß s2[c0]s1))))

  bitr4i((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß(s2[c0]s0 ‚àß s2[c0]s1)), (s2[(c0 |` c1)]s0 ‚àß s2[(c0 |` c1)]s1), ((s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2[c0]s0)‚àß(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2[c0]s1)))
  anandi(s2 ‚àà c1, s2[c0]s0, s2[c0]s1)
  anbi12i(s2[(c0 |` c1)]s0, s2[(c0 |` c1)]s1, (s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2[c0]s0), (s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2[c0]s1))
  elv(s0, (s2[(c0 |` c1)]s0 ‚Üî(s2 ‚àà c1 ‚àß s2[c0]s0)))
  brres(s0, universe, s2, c0, c1)

  diff.cres.s(s2, c0, c1)
  diff.cres.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.cres.s(s1, c0, c1)
}

thm dfcoels(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {

} = {
  3eqtri(ccoels(c0), copab(s0, s1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))), ccoss(cres(ccnv(cep), c0)), copab(s0, s1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s1))))))
  df-coels(c0)

  opabbii(s0, s1, wrex(s2, c0, wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s1)))), wrex(s2, c0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))))
  rexbii(s2, c0, wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s1))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2)))
  elv(s2, wb(wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cv(s2))))
  brcnvep(cv(s2), universe, cv(s0))
  elv(s2, wb(wbr(cv(s2), ccnv(cep), cv(s1)), wcel(cv(s1), cv(s2))))
  brcnvep(cv(s2), universe, cv(s1))
  diff.ccnv.s(s0, cep)
  diff.cep.s(s0)
  diff.ccnv.s(s1, cep)
  diff.cep.s(s1)
  diff.ccnv.s(s2, cep)
  diff.cep.s(s2)

thm brcoss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {

  -| diffsc(s0, c0)

  -| diffsc(s0, c2)

  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccoss(c4), c2), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2))))), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wbr(c0, ccoss(c4), c2), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2))))), diffsc(s0, c3))
  brabga(hs0, hs1, c0, c1, c2, c3, ccoss(c4), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2))), wex(s0, wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs1)))))
  exbidv(s0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2)), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs1))), wa(wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2)))
  bi2anan9(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs0)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, cv(hs1)), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c0), wbr(cv(s0), c4, c2))
  breq2(cv(hs0), c0, cv(s0), c4)
  breq2(cv(hs1), c2, cv(s0), c4)
  df-coss(hs0, hs1, s0, c4)

  diff.hs1.c(c2)

  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs1), c2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs1.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs1.c(c4)
}

  ideqg(hs1, universe, hs2)
  df-id(hs0, hs1)
  df-coss(hs0, hs1, hs2, cid)
  diff.hs0.s(hs2)
  diff.hs1.s(hs2)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.c(cid)
  diff.hs0.c(cid)
  diff.hs1.c(cid)
}

thm trcoss(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, class c0) {
  |- wi(wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s2, wal(s0, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s3)))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s3, c0)
} = {
  alrimiv(s2, wal(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wal(s0, wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))))))
  alimi(s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wal(s3, wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s3)))))
  alrimiv(s3, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wi(wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))))
  3imtr4g(wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))), wa(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3))), wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s3)), wa(wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s3))))), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s3)))))
  moantr(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s3)))
  anbi12i(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s3)))))
  el2v(s2, s0, wb(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s0)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))))
  brcoss(s1, cv(s2), universe, cv(s0), universe, c0)
  el2v(s0, s3, wb(wbr(cv(s0), ccoss(c0), cv(s3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s3))))))
  brcoss(s1, cv(s0), universe, cv(s3), universe, c0)
  el2v(s2, s3, wb(wbr(cv(s2), ccoss(c0), cv(s3)), wex(s1, wa(wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s2)), wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s3))))))
  brcoss(s1, cv(s2), universe, cv(s3), universe, c0)
  diff.wal.s(s2, s0, wmo(s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))))
  diff.wmo.s(s2, s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s2, cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wmo.s(s3, s1, wbr(cv(s1), c0, cv(s0)))
  diff.wbr.s(s3, cv(s1), c0, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
}

  brcoss(s1, s0, universe, s3, universe, c0)
  el2v(s2, s3, (s2[, ~(c0)]s3 ‚Üî ‚àÉ(s1,(s1[c0]s2 ‚àß s1[c0]s3))))
  brcoss(s1, s2, universe, s3, universe, c0)
  diff.wal.s(s2, s0, ‚àÉ*(s1, s1[c0]s0))
  diff.wmo.s(s2, s1, s1[c0]s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s2, s1, c0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)
  diffss.ex(s2, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
  diff.wmo.s(s3, s1, s1[c0]s0)
  diff.wbr.s(s3, s1, c0, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s1)
  diffss.ex(s3, s1)
  diff.cv.s(s3, s0)
  diffss.ex(s3, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s2)
  diff.universe.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s3)
}

thm eleccossin(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wcel(c0, cin(cec(c4, ccoss(c5)), cec(c2, ccoss(c5)))), wa(wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0), wbr(c0, ccoss(c5), c2))))
} = {
  syl6rbbr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cin(cec(c4, ccoss(c5)), cec(c2, ccoss(c5)))), wa(wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0), wbr(c0, ccoss(c5), c2)), wa(wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0), wbr(c2, ccoss(c5), c0)))
  anbi2d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0), wbr(c0, ccoss(c5), c2), wbr(c2, ccoss(c5), c0))
  brcosscnvcoss(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5)
  bitri(wcel(c0, cin(cec(c4, ccoss(c5)), cec(c2, ccoss(c5)))), wa(wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0), wbr(c2, ccoss(c5), c0)), wa(wcel(c0, cec(c4, ccoss(c5))), wcel(c0, cec(c2, ccoss(c5)))))
  elin(c0, cec(c4, ccoss(c5)), cec(c2, ccoss(c5)))
  anbi12i(wcel(c0, cec(c4, ccoss(c5))), wcel(c0, cec(c2, ccoss(c5))), wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0), wbr(c2, ccoss(c5), c0))
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cec(c4, ccoss(c5))), wbr(c4, ccoss(c5), c0)), wrel(ccoss(c5)))
  relelec(ccoss(c5), c0, c4)
  ax-mp(wb(wcel(c0, cec(c2, ccoss(c5))), wbr(c2, ccoss(c5), c0)), wrel(ccoss(c5)))
